website_summaries.verdict: These Asian-style chimes are great for decorative use, creating a tranquil mood, or for use in soft musical environments.
pros: Features 18 silver polished aluminum chime rods
Black and teak finish ash wood frame
Great for windowsill, desk, or other decorative spot
Works well in combination with crystal bowl music
cons: Not a wide variety of tones played

customer_reviews.title: Love these chimes.
customer_reviews.text: Looks lovely. I agree with the person who said it'd be great if there were more than just 3 lengths to the chimes. Don't agree that a gong is necessary; it would be another item sitting around. The chimes are beautiful in their simplicity. I have a number of Woodstock chimes (water, outdoor, indoor); the company puts out wonderful products. I would buy more of their products based on name alone.
customer_reviews.author: brmsy

customer_reviews.title: Instant zen!
customer_reviews.text: For most of the day, this sits quietly on the desk. But for those moments of overwhelming stress, just a gentle sweep of fingers over the chimes bring an audible sigh of relief. The harmonies are very soothing. My only regret is not purchasing it years ago!!!! (I do wish it came with a small mallet to sweep across the chimes, rather than your fingers, but I’m not unhappy about it)
customer_reviews.author: L. Blake

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful sounds
customer_reviews.text: Product looks exactly like pictured on Amazon, and product dimensions are accurate. It makes beautiful sounds and an attractive decorative piece. Notice that it's more decorative than functional in terms of making relaxing sounds because you obviously have to stroke the chimes for sounds. So, if you want constant relaxing sounds (and don't want to sit around all day striking chimes, though, nothing's wrong with that), the wind chime will better suit you. The metal chimes in mine do not line up as neatly as the one pictured on Amazon. Mine also came with a string broken, so one of the chimes fell off, so I had to return it.
customer_reviews.author: Riskitforbiscuit

customer_reviews.title: ATTRACTIVE CHIMES
customer_reviews.text: I really like these chimes, but let's be clear--this is primarily a decorative item. The shape and size of the stand are what attracted me to them, and I didn't expect them to sound beautiful. Thus I'm satisfied with my purchase. I think it's a reasonable price for something I enjoy looking at. I occasionally run my fingers across the chimes, and the sound is pleasant but only slightly musical. If you are looking for "real" musical chimes, these probably won't make you happy.
customer_reviews.author: Cooking Novice

customer_reviews.title: Kind of Monotone
customer_reviews.text: I guess I am used to the musical chimes I had with my drum kit, where every chime was different, and when you brushed it, there was this "swooshing" sound. Not so with this table chime. I brushed it and was kind of "eh...". Then I noticed that many of the chime pieces are exactly the same size, which would account for the lack of any sort of tone variance. I bought this for my wife as a gift, because she loved my musical chimes, which have long gone away, but this is a poor substitute for that musical sound. It looks nice sitting around, though.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher West

customer_reviews.title: Not very loud
customer_reviews.text: I bought these as a way to teach my class when to transition. These are so soft that my students would never hear them. I have had people see them and say they are beautiful and others liked them. Just not for getting a class of kindergartners quiet.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful chimes
customer_reviews.text: Perfect on my altar. It is very beautiful and the chimes sound great. Very relaxing.
customer_reviews.author: Fareed Rajack

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful sound
customer_reviews.text: A beautiful relaxing sound. The chimes sit next to my computer. When I feel stressed a strike the chimes. Many times I accidentally strike the chimes and the sounds immediately calms me.
customer_reviews.author: T. Brooks

customer_reviews.title: Very nice
customer_reviews.text: These chimes are very nice with a delicate tone. I have them sitting on an oriental style table and they look very nice. I ordered them for outdoors but they might not leave the house. I've been very happy with all my Woodstock chimes and hope to buy more.
customer_reviews.author: LucyLue

customer_reviews.title: LOVE IT!!!
customer_reviews.text: I really love these chimes. I bought them for my son to give them to me for Mother's Day but I couldn't wait! I put them in my bedroom windowsill. The sound is gorgeous. Every time the wind blows it sounds like angels are singing. It's sturdy and well made too. I'm sure it will last a long time. One of my favorite amazon purchases!
customer_reviews.author: Bookity

customer_reviews.title: Reminds me to take time out to be grateful and take a breath.
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful, love the design, Woodstock makes quality products. I would love it if it came with a small ball mallet so I could run it across the pipes.
customer_reviews.author: Laura R

customer_reviews.title: Attractive With A Pleasant Sound ...
customer_reviews.text: I already had two Woodstock Chimes. One set is even smaller than the Tranquility Chimes but has a surprisingly pleasant sound, so I thought there was a good chance that the Tranquility Chimes would have even better sounds. I ordered two as gifts for friends and certainly will consider additional sets in the future. Ir's a good look and good sound for a fair price.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen

customer_reviews.title: I'll just keep it on my desk and within easy reach.
customer_reviews.text: The chimes are double rowed and lightweight, so the tingles you get are not loud. I'm thinking of a way to get it placed near or above something with an air flow that is strong enough to make them "sing" all the time. I'm thinking putting it on something near a floor register, but I haven't found a way to do that yet. meanwhile, I'll just keep it on my desk and within easy reach.
customer_reviews.author: Helen D.

customer_reviews.title: For the price it should include a mallet
customer_reviews.text: Sounds great. My only complaint is that, for the price, it doesn't come with a mallet. I had to borrow one from my kids toy triangle.
customer_reviews.author: smeli18

customer_reviews.title: Terrible
customer_reviews.text: Sooo disappointed. The sound is terrible. This company has amazing products with beautiful sounds but this item is the worst! Don't waste your money on this! I did not want to give it a star but it would not post otherwise.
customer_reviews.author: Pat

customer_reviews.title: Rich sound, nicely tunes.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these chimes to go with the singing bowls I play at various functions. I was surprised to hear the rich sound quality it resonates. I got many compliments from the audience on how well the chimes went with the bowls and harp in the performance. Money well spent.
customer_reviews.author: Douglas Warren

customer_reviews.title: Quality, well made, beautiful wood and sound.
customer_reviews.text: Well made. Beautifully stained, solid wood. Durable. I was at first concerned that there was not something to strike the chimes with. However, I quickly found that a soft swift of my fingers plays a lovely sound. I use this in the classroom to get my student's attention quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Jr. Pey

customer_reviews.title: Three lenghts, not nine
customer_reviews.text: This is one of my favorite ambiance items. It is beautiful, sounds wonderful, and is just awesome. I have it displayed on a 10 x 6-Inch Burnished Bamboo Sushi Board. I was a little disappointed when I first got it because I was expecting more variety in the chime lengths, but the sound is fantastic enough that I'm cool with it.
customer_reviews.author: Penitent Tangent

customer_reviews.title: Nice complement to office decor.
customer_reviews.text: Nice quality in both workmanship and sound of the chimes. Placed it in my office and provides a nice, calming sound when needed!
customer_reviews.author: JamesN808

customer_reviews.title: These chimes are beautifully crafted and the sound is angelic
customer_reviews.text: These chimes are beautifully crafted and the sound is angelic. I play these when I perform crystal bowl meditations and they are a lovely added touch with a beautiful sound.
customer_reviews.author: Lori P

customer_reviews.title: Very nice
customer_reviews.text: This little table chime is very pretty and very cute. I don't so what there is to complain about. If you put it where there is a breeze it wil chime. Mine is on a side table right now not near a breeze, so I make it ring by hand. It sounds very sweet. It looks like a baby Asian temple or design. I am quite fond of it and my friends like it too. I bought one for a gift.
customer_reviews.author: atlasathome

customer_reviews.title: Looks and sounds great on my desk
customer_reviews.text: Looks and sounds great on my desk. Came in perfect condition. I was a little hesitant to buy this but so far I am glad I did.

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely love these chimes
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love these chimes ! Wonderful to put on windowsill when windows are open ! Made very well and pretty !

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful & Elegant Chimes. Perfect gift
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful chimes! They arrived quickly and they were in good condition too.

customer_reviews.title: Nice sound
customer_reviews.text: Lovely sound. My wife has it in her office and her patients love it

customer_reviews.title: Chimes look and sound beautiful

customer_reviews.author: flyingmec

customer_reviews.title: Woodstock Percussion Inc.
customer_reviews.text: Got this for Christmas. Love it I am fond of Oriental articles. This is perfect.

customer_reviews.title: Wanted this as an accent piece
customer_reviews.text: I love wind chimes, and I love Oriental-inspired pieces. This fit that bill for me the curved wood top. As pictured. As mentioned, I was looking for a visually pleasing accent piece. If you want it for pitch perfect chimes, your happiness factor may differ.
customer_reviews.author: CollectionOfAtoms

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Came in with one bar off its string. luckily i was able to fix it.
customer_reviews.author: Kin M. Wu

customer_reviews.title: Not what I expected.
customer_reviews.text: I thought this would sit in a window and wind would make it's chimes sound, but I guess they're too heavy, and the wind doesn't move them...I had to send this back.

customer_reviews.title: Cheaply made
customer_reviews.text: Cheaply made. Divots in both sets sent. And last one sent didn't have a chime attached, and you can't just push them in.

customer_reviews.title: nice
customer_reviews.text: I did not know it was small. But I like the sounds

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy it unless you just want to look at it.
customer_reviews.text: Very pretty but there is zero sound, even if I strike it with a metal tapper. There is no sound even when the wind blows through it. It is not good at all as a chime.

customer_reviews.title: Really nice tone. Nice quality.
customer_reviews.text: Great tone in these chimes. I have it in my massage room and my clients and I love it. One pass with your fingers and the sound will have you relaxed instantly. Love it.

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful music at your fingertips!
customer_reviews.text: Every household should have musical instruments easily available, especially ones that everyone is able to play & enjoy. These chimes are a pleasure to hear, and all ages will enjoy the simple act of running across the chimes and making beautiful musical sounds.

customer_reviews.title: This is a nice small version of chimes
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice smaller version of chimes that my parents have. My one year old loves to make them "sing". They do tangle but are not hard to untangle and probably wouldn't tangle if it didn't have a one year old playing with them :)

customer_reviews.title: beautiful

product_meta.title: Woodstock Chimes - The ORIGINAL Guaranteed Musically Tuned Chime, Tranquility Table Chime
product_meta.description: GUARANTEED MUSICALLY TUNED TRANQUILITY TABLE CHIME. The sounds of this peaceful chime create a relaxed, tranquil environment. A perfect gift for the busy executive or hard-working soccer mom, the Woodstock Tranquility Table Chime is designed to help you create your own restful environment. Its mellow tones can help soothe your mind during a stressful day. It provides a reminder to stop, take a deep breath and listen. Listen to the voice within. PRODUCT FEATURES. Black and teak finish ash wood, 18 silver polished aluminum rods, and satin black aluminum uprights. QUALITY THAT IS GUARANTEED.Woodstock stands behind every product they make with a one-year warranty and a lifetime tuning guarantee on their musically tuned chimes. WOODSTOCK THE ORIGINAL MUSICALLY TUNED CHIME. Tuned to beautiful melodies and scales from around the world and available in a wide range of styles, songs and sizes, you can choose the Woodstock Chime that speaks to your soul. HOW IT ALL BEGAN. Garry and his wife Diane founded Woodstock Percussion, in 1979 and it remains a family-owned business in New York's Hudson Valley. Grammy award-winning musician Garry Kvistad created the first Woodstock Chime from an aluminum lawn chair he found in a landfill. As a professional musician and instrument designer, he was fascinated by the Scales of Olympos, a 7th century pentatonic scale that can't be played on a modern piano. Garry had the idea to cut and tune the lawn chair chime tubes to the exact frequency of the ancient scale. The resulting Chimes of Olympos was the first Woodstock Chime and is still one of our bestselling wind chimes.
feature_bullets: MUSICALLY TUNED: The mellow tones of this peaceful table chime create a relaxed, tranquil environment to help soothe your mind during a stressful day; lifetime tuning guarantee
DIMENSIONS: The Tranquility table chime stands 9-inches tall, is 10-inches wide, and 3-inches deep
EXPERTLY CRAFTED: Features an ash wood frame with an elegant black and teak finish; 18 high-polish silver aluminum rods; satin black aluminum uprights
SOOTHE AWAY STRESS: A great gift for the busy executive or hard-working soccer mom, It provides a reminder to stop, take a deep breath and listen to the voice within

QUALITY YOU CAN TRUST: Created by Grammy award-winning musician and instrument designer Garry Kvistad, Woodstock Chimes offers a unique variety of high quality, affordable chimes, gongs, musical instruments and more that inspire, entertain and bring pleasure to people of all ages
The sounds of this peaceful chime will help to create a relaxed and tranquil environment
Black and teak finish ash wood frame looks beautiful with any home or office decor
Woodstock chimes are created by Grammy Award winning musician Garry Kvistad
Table chime is 9-inch tall, 10-inch wide, and 3-inch deep
